title: End of a Cobbled Era: Peter Sagan, Greg Van Avermaet Confirm Final Races Before Retirement
content:
Former rivals and Paris-Roubaix champions take their final rides in the road peloton in the coming weekends.

Read the full article at End of a Cobbled Era: Peter Sagan, Greg Van Avermaet Confirm Final Races Before Retirement on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
